name: FLOOR BY FLOOR (itch)
description:
DESCRIPTION

Obliterate your enemies with an arsenal of customizable weapons and equipment in this ultra fast Cyber Punk top down shooter. Take advantage of your customizable OVERCLOCK mode to push your body to its limits!

ALPHA TEST 2
As this is the first public build of FLOOR BY FLOOR,  the game in its current state is pretty buggy and doesn't represent FLOOR BY FLOOR as a finished product. That being said, we'd love to hear any feedback you have!

WHATS TO COME?
Some of the features we have in the works are:

  • Utility items like grenades, grappling hooks, and more
  • Additional weapons and firing modes to expand your combat capabilities
  • More OVERCLOCK chips so you can dominate your opponents
  • New enemy types that present interesting challenges
  • Passive upgrades to improve your character as you play through the game

And much much more!

Its hard to say exactly how long development will take as it stands, but we intend to release on steam early access sometime within the next two years. It'll be a long trip to release, and we hope you'll stick with us until then!

If you want to support development, consider donating and following us on Twitter where we post (semi) frequent updates!

We've also opened a Discord server (something professional but relatable here)

SPECIAL THANKS

Special thanks to the talented Evelina Chavez for producing the main theme of the game, check her out on Instagram!
